Sparky and I Love this place! I love that they have pick up, drop off and even overnights so I don‚Äôt have to worry if I‚Äôm working overnight or get called in for an emergency in the middle of the night!
Highly recommend for all physicians taking overnight calls.
Love each and every member of their team.
Grooming is great too, they really make Sparky Sparkle! üòÇ‚ù§Ô∏è

originalText.text: Love this place. They people are so friendly, and I take my dog their at least twice a week. They are always on the ball and carefully watch the dogs. They even called me to let me know my dog was due a vaccine re-up in a month based on his tags, which I had completely forgotten. I have never had a bad experience after using them consistently for almost a year, and my dog is always very excited to go inside when we walk by. I highly recommend them.

originalText.text:
So far I‚Äôm loving the way they take care of my precious Calvin, who‚Äôs very connected to me!

Unfortunately, Calvin injured his rear leg last year while on a trip, so he‚Äôs insecure with new people and new places.

However, I‚Äôve found at Roosevelt Pups people who truly love animals and understand their needs, cause the way they organise their space is incredible!

They seem to have groups of dogs with size and energy levels! Calvin is not yet fully adapted, but that‚Äôs due to his insecurities with new people‚Ä¶ I get daily videos of him walking around the island (which he LOVES), interacting with other dogs and being spoiled by the sweet Melissa, one of the staff members!

When I come in the morning to drop Calvin off, they‚Äôre always smiling greeting us, always willing to follow every step of our recommendations and specially keeping the place neat and cozy! ü•∞

There are photos of the dogs at the lobby of the place and I can‚Äôt wait to have Calvin‚Äôs photo there, cause he‚Äôs going to be there while we are living nearby! ü•∞

I was a bit insecure to leave Calvin at a new daycare, so I made so many recommendations and two misunderstandings happened, which were IMMEDIATELY addressed and corrected! They are 100% professionals and now I am so relieved to have found such place for my dog, who‚Äôs not just my best friend, he‚Äôs my son and he means my entirely world! ü•∞üêæ

Thank you Nema and everyone at Roosevelt Pups! ‚ù§Ô∏èüêæüêï‚Äçü¶∫

originalText.text: Took my small dog here for over a year for grooming because of the convenient location. I always asked for a puppy cut,  nothing particular. The cut was always uneven, especially around the face/head. The last time I went the cut was so obviously uneven, about 1in difference from his head to his body, and the nails were not trimmed and when I asked why, I was told my 10lb dog was difficult and this is the reason. The groomer proceeded to tell me that I shouldn‚Äôt expect a perfect cut. That is an odd answer to give as an even hair cut is not a high expectation.

The groomer proceeded to tell me that I shouldn‚Äôt expect a perfect cut. That is an odd answer to give as an even hair cut is not a high expectation.

originalText.text: Very solid Doggy daycare where the staff really does care about each and every dog. My pup gets excited every time we go :-)
